[Eye Slash](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2206)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 120 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Small scars or marks around your eye improve your distant vision. These scars are especially common among [orc](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=19) scouts, who favor scars shaped like eagle talons. You can see four times farther than normal. If you have [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), you can see blood in color. Higher-level versions of an _eye slash_ are larger and more elaborate scars or marks, radiating out around the eye.
